About

Hi! I'm a web developer based in Manila, Philippines, currently pursuing a BS Computer Science degree at CIIT College of Arts and Technology. I specialize in frontend web development but also have some experience working on the backend side of things.

Before diving into web development, I explored graphic design as a hobby, which now helps me blend creativity with code to build visually appealing and user-friendly websites.

When I'm not coding, you'll probably find me gaming, thrifting for unique fashion finds, jamming to music, or catching up on the latest adventures in One Piece.
